Book printer Otto Müller starts running his commercial business on 01.04.01. At this point of time his equity amounts to 200,000 € whereas liabilities do not exist. On 31.12.01 he prepares his financial statements. For the year 01 his income is 220,000 € and his expenses are 130,000 €. Moreover equity was only modified by operational processes. What is the net income of the financial year ?

On 31.12.01 he prepares his financial statements. For the year 01 his income is 220,000 € and his expenses are 130,000 €. Moreover equity was only modified by operational processes. What are the net assets (= equity) at the end of the financial year ?

options: A Increase of net assets of 220.000 €.
B Increase of net assets of 90.000 €.
C Decrease of net assets of 130.000 €.
D Decrease of net assets of 290.000 €.

D The equity analysis is a period calculation, e.g for the period of 1.1.XX until 31.12.XX.
